duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing payroll processes and ensuring accurate and timely compensation distribution to employees.
Leading a team responsible for managing all aspects of payroll, from data entry to tax compliance.
Administering benefit programs such as 401k, defined benefit plan, health, and life insurance programs.
Preparing payroll journal entries for review by the Controller.
Administering weekly and monthly union reports of hours worked.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or Business is required.
